term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - particle size in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: particle size

item.text: To describe the size of liquid or solid particles (aerosol) the average or equivalent diameter is used. For non-spherical particles collected in an impactor, for example, the aerodynamic diameter of a particle of arbitrary shape and density refers to the size of a spherical particle of unit density that would deposit on a given impactor surface.
